attributes.action: i want children to be tested in school for dyslexia
attributes.additional_details: Because as a mother who works full time and pays into the system it sadness me and shocks me that i have to pay privately for my children to be recognized as been dyslexia , and then have to continue that support as school are not equipped to do because the government are taking funds of them all the time . These children are the future of the UK we need to invest in them
attributes.background: i want the Government to look into the services that are offered to school and children who have dyslexia or any learning difficult , i want them to be given resource and to be able to test the children , so that a solution can be found

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:

Improve support for students with dyslexia and other learning difficulties
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/616514
